description:
Military Intelligence Service Director http://anidb.net/ch116689 [Mycroft] orders http://anidb.net/ch109855 [Albert] to recover classified papers that could rock the nation, and kill the woman who stole them. http://anidb.net/ch109857 [Sherlock] is hired by the king of Bohemia to pursue http://anidb.net/ch116686 [Irene Adler], who threatens the king`s wedding plans.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Scandal in the British Empire Act 1
大英帝国の醜聞 第一幕
